item.title: John Carpenter's The Thing
item.description:
John Carpenter's The Thing

Property of Universal Pictures. http://www.thrillerchiller.com presents a screening of John Carpenter's The Thing playing at Thriller! Chiller! Grand Rapids premier film festival celebrating the genre movie.

item.title: Stranger Things
item.description:
Stranger Things

A love letter to the supernatural classics of the 80's, Stranger Things is the story of a young boy who vanishes into thin air. As friends, family and local police search for answers, they are drawn into an extraordinary mystery involving top-secret government experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one very strange little girl.

item.title: Last Exit to Nowhere
item.description:
Last Exit to Nowhere

T-shirt designs which are inspired and pay homage to some of the most memorable places, corporations and companies in 20th century fiction.

item.title: RESIDENT EVIL: THE FINAL CHAPTER - Official Teaser Trailer
item.description:
RESIDENT EVIL: THE FINAL CHAPTER - Official Teaser Trailer

This January, evil comes home. #ResidentEvilMovie For more 'Resident Evil', follow us on social: FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/ResidentEvilMovie/ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/ResidentEvil INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/residentevil/ Subscribe for exclusives: http://bit.ly/SonyPicsSubscribeYT Picking up immediately after the events in Resident Evil: Retribution, Alice (Milla Jovovich) is the only survivor of what was meant to be humanity's final stand against the undead.

item.title: 23 Days | The Strain Season 3 Promo | FX
item.description:
23 Days | The Strain Season 3 Promo | FX

It's been 23 days since the nightmare began. Revenge is coming. The Strain returns August 28th on FX. FOLLOW THE STRAIN http://www2.fxnetworks.com/shows/the-strain https://www.facebook.com/TheStrainFX https://twitter.com/TheStrainFX ABOUT THE STRAIN The transformation has begun. It can no longer be denied - New York City is rapidly falling to an evil epidemic, and no one is coming to its rescue.

item.title: Rue Morgue
item.description:
Rue Morgue

Rue Morgue is the world's premier Horror In Culture & Entertainment magazine since 1997
